mapper.update: update bsc_proj_exe_mth set is_published = 'Y' where month_id = #{month_id} and project_id = #{project_id}
mapper.select: select t.project_id, t.object_id, t.object_name, a.month_id, a.score, a.sys_proj_rank_id, a.adj_proj_rank_id, a.adj_reason, rownum rn from bsc_proj_obj_h t left join bsc_proj_obj_score a on t.project_id = a.project_id and t.object_id = a.object_id and a.month_id = #{month_id} where t.project_id = #{project_id} and #{query_date} between t.begin_date and t.end_date and t.year_id = #{year_id} order by a.score desc, t.object_id

select nvl(a.adj_proj_rank_id,a.sys_proj_rank_id) level_id, count(*) as level_count from bsc_proj_obj_score a,bsc_proj_obj_h b where a.project_id = b.project_id and a.object_id = b.object_id and a.project_id = #{project_id} and a.month_id = #{month_id} and #{query_date} between b.begin_date and b.end_date and b.year_id = #{year_id} group by nvl(a.adj_proj_rank_id,a.sys_proj_rank_id)

select case when is_cycle_end_mth = 'Y' and is_published = 'N' then 0 when is_published = 'Y' then 1 else 2 end as num from bsc_proj_exe_mth where project_id = #{project_id} and month_id = #{month_id}

select s.month_id, s.month_label, s.score, s.score_coef, s.score_order from (select a.month_id, substr(a.month_id,1,4)||'-'||substr(a.month_id,5,2) as month_label, a.score, a.score_coef, a.score_order from bsc_proj_obj_score a, bsc_proj_exe_mth b where a.project_id = #{project_id} and a.object_id = #{object_id} and a.month_id = b.month_id and a.project_id = b.project_id
and b.is_cycle_end_mth = 'Y'
and a.month_id <= #{month_id} and rownum <= 12
order by a.month_id desc ) s order by s.month_id
select measure_id as measure_id, measure_name as mea_definition from bsc_measure where measure_id in (${meaId}) order by measure_id
select t.year_id as object_id, year_id || '年' as object_name from bsc_proj_obj_h t where t.project_id = #{project_id} group by t.year_id

select c.cycle_id as month_id, c.cycle_id||'年' as month_name, max(t.object_name) object_name, ${case_sql} from bsc_proj_obj_h t inner join bsc_proj_stat_cyc c on t.project_id =c.project_id and t.year_id =c.cycle_id left join bsc_proj_mea_obj_val b on t.project_id = b.project_id and t.object_id = b.object_id and t.year_id=b.month_id
and b.month_id in (${tId})
where t.project_id = #{project_id}
and t.object_id in (${oId})
and t.year_id in (${tId})
group by c.cycle_id order by c.cycle_id desc

select t.year_id month_id, t.year_id||'年' as month_name, max(t.object_name) object_name, ${case_sql} from bsc_proj_obj_h t inner join bsc_proj_stat_cyc c on t.project_id =c.project_id and t.year_id =c.cycle_id left join bsc_proj_mea_obj_val b on t.project_id = b.project_id and t.object_id = b.object_id and t.year_id=b.month_id where t.project_id = #{project_id}
and t.object_id in (${oId})
and t.year_id in (${tId})
group by t.year_id order by t.year_id desc
